title: editor_portfolio
description: A comprehensive autonomous branding project for Travis Singletary, a Los Angeles-based Digital Creator and Professional Editor. This project integrates high-end video production data from Vimeo and YouTube with personal branding and community engagement data from Facebook and Instagram. The goal is to build a style_manifesto.json for AI-assisted editing and a professional portfolio on Port 8083 that reflects both technical mastery and a high-engagement digital creator persona.
